Container.Name: PlexStarCleaner
Container.Description: A scheduled Docker container that automatically cleans up watched Plex media from Sonarr and Radarr based on community user ratings.

Config.Name: Dry Run
Config.Description: Set to 'true' to log actions without deleting files. Set to 'false' to enable deletion. HIGHLY RECOMMEND starting with 'true'.

Config.Name: Days Delay
Config.Description: Days since last watched before media is considered for deletion.

Config.Name: Rating Threshold
Config.Description: Media with an average user rating BELOW this value will be deleted.

Config.Name: Cron Schedule
Config.Description: Time of day (HH:MM) in 24-hour format to run the daily job.

Config.Name: Tautulli URL
Config.Description: Full URL to your Tautulli server.

Config.Name: Tautulli API Key
Config.Description: Your API key from Tautulli Settings.

Config.Name: Radarr URL
Config.Description: Full URL to your Radarr server.

Config.Name: Radarr API Key
Config.Description: Your API key from Radarr Settings.

Config.Name: Sonarr URL
Config.Description: Full URL to your Sonarr server.

Config.Name: Sonarr API Key
Config.Description: Your API key from Sonarr Settings.
